description: *Sync and charge your Galaxy S4 with the EZOPower USB Dual Dock Cradle Desktop Charger.This dual dock cradle desktop charger lets the phone charge while synchronized with your PC to transfer files and media. A 2nd battery slot is located on the rear of the cradle so you can charge a spare or replacement battery while charging the phone.Brand new EZOPower retail packaging.3-In-1 Features: Synchronize, Charge Phone and Charge 2nd Battery.First slot: Sync and charge phone.Second slot: Charge 2nd battery.Dock your phone with or without case cover with the detachable case plate on/offThe USB docking cradle holds your smartphone at a comfortable reading angle and provides convenient access on your desk.Portable design and convenient for travelers and business users.Package include Cradle, USB Cable, AC Adapter.Phone & battery not included.*USB cable sync & charge phone and 2nd battery*AC adapter charge both phone & 2nd battery*Does not work with the extended battery*Fit about 80% of the standardized slim cases selling on the market. Doesn't Fit all.*Notes: The battery charging slot is design to charge Samsung Galaxy S4 battery up to 85-90% full only. This it to prevent the battery from over charging and damaging the Samsung Galaxy S4 battery. Phone charging slot can charge the battery to 100%.*Compatible with Global Version Samsung Galaxy S4 i9500, AT&T;, T-Mobile, Sprint, Verizon, Cricket, US Cellular
title: EZOPower USB DUAL Cradle Desktop Charger for Samsung Galaxy S4 S IV i9500 Android Smartphone with Spare Battery Charging Slot/ Detachable Case Plate / Sync and Charge Function
